title: Restaurant La Maison Kam Fung
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The non-meat items are vegan. Uses no mock meats; tofu products instead. Atmosphere is typical of a Chinese banquet restaurant. Offers a vegetarian set menu for 4 or 6 people, or you can order the dishes separately as well. The set menu with vegetarian option is in Chinese only, so ask the waitress/waiter for advice. Reservations are recommended.
